text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] be a [mathjaxinline]4\times 3[/mathjaxinline] matrix. Suppose that [mathjaxinline]x = \left[\begin{array}{c} 1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline] is a solution to the equation [mathjaxinline]Ax = v[/mathjaxinline], and suppose that [mathjaxinline]x = \left[\begin{array}{c} 2 \\ -1 \\ 4 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline] is a solution to the equation [mathjaxinline]Ax = w[/mathjaxinline].
Find a solution to the equation [mathjaxinline]Ax = v+w[/mathjaxinline].
